trends: There have been no other sightings in Battle Mountain
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Details1,i was in the back seat of our car. tormenting my sister. 2, the car's power and engine died from front to rear and freaked out my father. then we noticed a distortion above, about 7:00 high and west, n.west. 3, my dad scrambled to get the car running, i was mesmerized and could not move. 4,i really cant. 5,fear,awe,panic, could not move or speak for what seemed to a child like hours. 6,never really had sight of it. it was just a blur or distortion in the sky. since then i believe the car dieing and coming back on was some kind of emp.event.have no reasonable explanation of what happened or the strange events afterwards.
Summary: like a blury transperency that turned the power off in our car
